attributes.action: Prosecute all involved in baby P's case for negligence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that everyone involved in this case, has been negligent in their duties, each and everyone involve should stand and be made accountable for their actions and decisions.
If their cases are proven against them, then they should stand trial for child neglect and assistance to murder.
Hopefully leading to a jail sentence not just sacked????

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/babyPpeter/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
